name: Last Stand
description:
Last Stand is a strategy defense game that combines elements of mild roguelike gameplay. Only by skillfully managing resources can you fearlessly fight your way to the end.


Confronted by the endless onslaught of mechanical legions (or automatron?), the Human Alliance has been forced to make a desperate choice: to send Future Agent Natasha back in time on a mission to obliterate the root cause of the impending apocalypse—the Eve Quantum Core. The sole individual who knows its whereabouts is Morgen, the last surviving hero from the First Man-machine War. Assisted by Morgen's granddaughter, Wawa, and her companion Linxiao, Natasha and her team have finally set foot upon the ancient battleground of the South Pole. However, what awaits them is a group of monsters from the extra dimension. A sinister conspiracy is about to be unveiled.


Key Features:
One-Handed Operation: Your choices outweigh your speed.
The game focus on strategy, where victory is within reach if you wisely manage resources to upgrade heroes and defense towers. Friendly for players who may not have the fastest reflexes.
Hero-Tower Synergy: Pair strategically to unleash the full potential.
You have access to three heroes and eleven types of defenses, with hundreds of skill combinations between them. Choosing the right skill combination can make it easier to eliminate enemies.
Random Dynamics: All Roads Lead to Rome
The gameplay, including hero attribute growth, skill upgrades, and defense tower construction, incorporates a significant amount of randomness. Making sound choices and allocating these random elements wisely will be the key to victory.
Challenging Levels: Varies monsters await your challenge.
As the level of difficulty progresses, you'll face increasingly diverse combinations of monsters. Some are heavily armored, while others may come in swarms. Adapt your defenses promptly to conquer demanding challenges.
